{{See also|Mist Bubble (Exploration)}}
'''Wooden Crates''',<ref>Official Interactive Map: [https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=129 Teyvat]</ref> colloquially known as '''Floating Crates''', are small floating objects found in bodies of water that yield 500, 1000, or 1500 [[Mora]] when [[Investigation|investigated]]. Floating Crates in [[Liyue]] also yield 2 [[Geo Sigil]]s. They count towards [[Map|exploration progress]].

For specific locations, see the [https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=129 Official Interactive Map].

==Drop Rate==
The Mora drop of Wooden Crates are split into 3 separate rolls, which may result in 500, 1000, or 1500 Mora.
{| class="wikitable"
! Roll !! Drops !! Probability
|-
| 1 || {{Item|Mora|x=500}} || 100%
|-
| 2 || {{Item|Mora|x=500}} || 50%
|-
| 3 || {{Item|Mora|x=500}} || 50%
|}
